version_description:
1. Added the TestOut feature, short cuts for users who wish to skip lessons;
2. UI adaptation for iPad Devices;
3. Bugs fixed.

1. Added the TestOut feature, short cuts for users who wish to skip lessons;
2. UI adaptation for iPad Devices;
3. Bugs fixed.

LingoDeer is now compatible with iPhone X! You can also type answers with your own keyboard. Introduction to Japanese and Korean alphabets are added. The rest is housekeeping stuff: bug fixed and UX improved.

LingoDeer is now compatible with iPhone X! You can also type answers with your own keyboard. Introduction to Japanese and Korean alphabets are added. The rest is housekeeping stuff: bug fixed and UX improved.
You can now adjust the background color, font size and turn on/off animation during a lesson. Flashcard algorithm has been improved. The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
You can now adjust the background color, font size and turn on/off animation during a lesson. Flashcard algorithm has been improved. The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
You can now adjust the background color, font size and turn on/off animation during a lesson. Flashcard algorithm has been improved. The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
Added an info feed to send you extra learning tips. The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
Added an info feed to send you extra learning tips. The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
Added an info feed to send you extra learning tips. The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
Try our new feature in beta! Check out Chinese units 1-12 and Japanese units 1-6. The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
NEW Voice Packs for Korean and Japanese lessons are here. Thank you for your continued support.
NEW Voice Packs for Korean and Japanese lessons are here. Thank you for your continued support.
NEW Voice Packs for Korean and Japanese lessons are here. Thank you for your continued support.
NEW Voice Packs for Korean and Japanese lessons are here. Thank you for your continued support.
NEW Voice Packs for Korean and Japanese lessons are here. Thank you for your continued support.
NEW Voice Packs for Korean and Japanese lessons are here. Thank you for your continued support.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Try our new feature in beta! Check out Chinese units 1-12 and Japanese units 1-6. The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
The Story feature is now available in all three languages. And more Stories coming soon! The rest is routine bug fixes and improvements.
<3 Thanks for using LingoDeer. The new XP system will reward you more points for learning! Sync between iOS and Android is back. Enjoy!
<3 Thanks for using LingoDeer. The new XP system will reward you more points for learning! Sync between iOS and Android is back. Enjoy!
Fixed these issues: unable to log in, offline download stuck in halfway, progress not displayed, and progress in Alphabets not saved. Thank you for your patience.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Hi deer! LingoDeer is now available in Spanish, French, German, Japanese and Korean. Enjoy!
This update contains a lot of bug fixes and improvements that will make language learning more enjoyable!
Yay! Vietnamese for English speakers and Portuguese for English speakers (beta) are here. More Japanese, Korean and Chinese lessons are under construction. Thank you for your support!
This update contains a lot of bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed incompatibility issues and crashes in typing exercises.
Spanish, French and German for English speakers are now in beta. Please try them out and let us know what you think. Enjoy!
Let's practice writing Kanjis stroke by stroke! Check out the new "Kanji" section in Alphabet of the Japanese course.
You can now pratice a random mix of questions or your own selection in REVIEW. Keep calm and review more!
Added French, Spanish and German Alphabets for English users. This update includes other bug fixes that make language learning more enjoyable and convenient.
Added French, Spanish and German Alphabets for English users. This update includes other bug fixes that make language learning more enjoyable and convenient.
Added French, Spanish and German Alphabets for English users. This update includes other bug fixes that make language learning more enjoyable and convenient.

Fixed app crashes in the last version.

Japanese 2 and Korean 2 are here! Learn Spanish, French, German and Portuguese with Stories!
Japanese 2 and Korean 2 are here! Learn Spanish, French, German and Portuguese with Stories!
The 5-Min Quiz and Knowledge Cards are here! Enjoy!
The 5-Min Quiz and Knowledge Cards are here! Enjoy!
Bugs fixed: blank Kanji page, problems in Japanese vocab exercises and display issues with long Japanese sentences
This update includes other bug fixes that make language learning more enjoyable and convenient.
This update includes other bug fixes that make language learning more enjoyable and convenient.
Added a wider range of audio speed and daily goals to choose from. This update includes other bug fixes that make language learning more enjoyable and convenient.
This update includes other bug fixes that make language learning more enjoyable and convenient.
Merry Christmas! Enjoy new lessons in Chinese 2, Japanese 2 and Korean 2 during the winter break!
Early Happy New Year! We made typing questions harder (by turning off auto-correct). Fixed bugs and made improvements.
New year, new skill: make finishing a LingoDeer course your goal of 2019! You can learn English from French now. We also improved the general performance and fixed bugs.
New year, new skill: make finishing a LingoDeer course your goal of 2019! You can learn English from French now. We also improved the general performance and fixed bugs.
Привет! Check out our new lessons in Russian 1 and Chinese 2. This update also fixed some other bugs.
Привет! Check out our new lessons in Russian 1 and Chinese 2. This update also fixed some other bugs.
Привет! Check out our new lessons in Russian 1 and Chinese 2. This update also fixed some other bugs.

Russian and French learners, a few bugs in the lessons got fixed.
Korean learners, now you can choose if the app should control your spacing in Settings.
This update includes other bug fixes and improvements.

We added Knowledge Cards in Chinese 1 and Korean 2. Happy learning!
Knowledge Cards have been added to Japanese 2 and Chinese 2. Thank you for waiting!

We enhanced Review! Now you can review weak items only, at most 50 items per round.
Audio autoplay has been disabled in some exercises to make things more challenging.
Check out the new summary page at the end of the lesson and the review session. Got feedback? Message us in the app!

Learn Chinese with videos and Speech Recognition! This update brings you two new features that will boost your fluency and help you to stay motivated!  You can now complete exercises with videos of native Chinese speakers and speak better Chinese by having your recording graded, powered by Apple.

Hi everyone! Let's practice Chinese with the new Chinese audio resources in male vioce. Thank you all for waiting. Please tell us know how you like this new addition. You can find us at @lingodeer on all social media or via email hi@lingodeer.com.

Hi everyone! New feature arrived ! You could share your learning progress in your social media account now. In addition, let's practice Chinese with the new Chinese audio resources in male vioce. Thank you all for waiting. Please tell us know how you like this new addition. You can find us at @lingodeer on all social media or via email hi@lingodeer.com.

Hi! Time to liven up the summer with some Italian charm! The advanced Italian course is available now.
Thank you for waiting. Please let us know how you like the new addition. Find us @lingodeer on all social media or via email hi@lingodeer.com.

Hi deer! Take a look at Italian Alphabet in the Italian Course and master the pronunciation of the language of music!
Eager for more? The Survival Italian phrasebook has the essentials for you!
Also, why not try Fluent French and start some real French conversations?
